hero.title: No more
hero.subtitle: Create a bubble for your family, friends, or coworkers. Everyone shares what they want, and you can quietly pick gifts without ruining the surprise.

occasions.title: Perfect for Every Occasion
occasions.subtitle: From birthdays to holidays, WishBubble helps you coordinate gifts for any celebration.

features.title: Why people love WishBubble
features.subtitle: Finally, a wishlist that actually works for bubbles.

groupFirst.title: Made for bubbles
groupFirst.description: Create a space for your family, friend bubble, or team. Everyone can see each other's wishes in one place.

privacyAware.title: Surprises Stay Secret
privacyAware.description: When you pick a gift for someone, they won't know. But everyone else can see it's taken, so no duplicates!

secretSanta.title: Secret Santa Built In
secretSanta.description: Draw names automatically and fairly. You can even make sure couples don't pick each other.

reusable.title: One wishlist, many bubbles
reusable.description: Use your wishlist with family AND friends. Update it once, and it's updated everywhere.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: You'll be up and running in minutes

step1.title: Create Your Bubble
step1.description: Pick a name, set a date, and decide on a budget. Done!

step2.title: Invite Everyone
step2.description: Send invites by email or share a link. It's that easy.

step3.title: Add Your Wishes
step3.description: Everyone adds what they'd love to receive. Include links and prices to make it easy.

step4.title: Pick Your Gifts
step4.description: Choose what you want to buy. We'll make sure no one else picks the same thing.

socialProof.title: Ready to make gift-giving fun again?
socialProof.subtitle: WishBubble is a young project built with care. We're eager to grow, listen to every piece of feedback, and make it work perfectly for you.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free and upgrade when you need more. No hidden fees.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Here's what people usually want to know.

items.question: What exactly is a 'bubble'?
items.answer: A bubble is just your gift-giving circle - like your family, friends, or office team. It's a private space where everyone can share their wishlists and pick gifts for each other.

items.question: How do you prevent duplicate gifts?
items.answer: When you pick a gift from someone's list, they can't see that you've picked it (keeps the surprise!), but everyone else can see it's taken. Simple!

items.question: Is it really free?
items.answer: Yes! The free plan lets you create 2 bubbles with up to 8 members each, and 3 wishlists with 4 items. Perfect for trying out WishBubble with your family or friends.

items.question: Can I share my wishlist with multiple bubbles?
items.answer: Definitely! You can use the same wishlist with your family, your friends, your coworkers - wherever. Update it once, and everyone sees the latest version.

items.question: How does Secret Santa work?
items.answer: Just click a button and we'll randomly pick who gives to whom. Everyone gets an email with their person. You can even set rules like 'don't pair up couples'.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At WishBubble, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: WishBubble is the data controller responsible for your personal data. We are based in Belgium and process your data in accordance with EU data protection law. For any privacy-related inquiries, contact us at privacy@wish-bubble.app.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: Under GDPR, we must have a lawful basis for processing your personal data. We rely on the following:

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: For optional features like marketing emails and non-essential cookies, we ask for your explicit consent.

contract.title: Contractual necessity
contract.content: To provide our service, we need to process certain data (e.g., your email for account creation).

legitimate.title: Legitimate interests
legitimate.content: For security, fraud prevention, and service improvement, balanced against your rights.

legal.title: Legal obligations
legal.content: To comply with applicable laws (e.g., tax regulations, court orders).

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect only the data necessary to provide our service. We practice data minimization and do not collect more than we need.

items.account: Account information: Email address, name, and password (hashed)
items.wishlists: Content: Wishlists, items, Bubble memberships, and claims you create
items.communications: Communications: Messages you send to support

items.device: Device information: Browser type, operating system, device type
items.usage: Usage data: Pages visited, features used, timestamps
items.cookies: Cookies: As described in our Cookie Policy (with your consent for non-essential cookies)

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your data to: (1) Provide and maintain our service, including account management and wishlist functionality; (2) Send transactional emails (password resets, invitations); (3) Send notification emails if you opt in; (4) Analyze usage to improve our service (anonymized/aggregated where possible); (5) Ensure security and prevent fraud; (6) Comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We only share your information with trusted third parties who help us operate our service, and only to the extent necessary.

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Some of our service providers are based in the United States. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for any international transfers, including Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission, and we verify that recipients maintain adequate data protection standards.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including: encrypted data transmission (HTTPS/TLS), secure password storage using bcrypt hashing, access controls and authentication, regular security reviews, and secure hosting infrastructure. While no system is 100% secure, we continuously work to protect your data.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary: Active accounts are retained while in use; deleted accounts have their data permanently removed within 30 days; backup data is purged within 90 days; anonymized analytics data may be kept indefinitely. You can request deletion at any time through your account settings.

rights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.intro: As an EU resident, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right of access
access.content: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you

erasure.title: Right to erasure (Right to be forgotten)
erasure.content: Request deletion of your personal data

restriction.title: Right to restriction
restriction.content: Limit how we process your data

portability.title: Right to data portability
portability.content: Receive your data in a machine-readable format (JSON)

objection.title: Right to object
objection.content: Object to processing based on legitimate interests

withdraw.title: Right to withdraw consent
withdraw.content: Withdraw consent at any time for consent-based processing

rights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, use the options below or contact privacy@wish-bubble.app. We will respond within 30 days.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies for essential functionality and, with your consent, for analytics and preferences. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: WishBubble is not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16. If you believe we have collected data from a child under 16, please contact us immediately and we will delete it.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of material changes via email or a prominent notice on our website. The 'last updated' date at the top indicates when the policy was last revised.

authority.title: Supervisory Authority
authority.content: If you believe we have not adequately addressed your privacy concerns, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the Belgian Data Protection Authority (Gegevensbeschermingsautoriteit) or your local supervisory authority.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions, data requests, or concerns, please use our contact form. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 30 days.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to WishBubble. By using our platform, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully. These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy, govern your use of our service.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using WishBubble, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service, our Privacy Policy, and Cookie Policy. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, you may not use our service.

age.title: 2. Age Requirement
age.content: You must be at least 16 years old to use WishBubble. If you are under 18, you must have parental or guardian consent to use our service. By using WishBubble, you represent that you meet these requirements. This aligns with GDPR requirements for data processing consent.

account.title: 3. Your Account
account.content: You are responsible for: (a) maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials; (b) all activities that occur under your account; (c) providing accurate and complete information when creating an account; (d) keeping your information up to date. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

content.title: 4. User Content
content.content: You retain full ownership of content you create (wishlists, items, etc.). By posting content, you grant us a limited, non-exclusive license to use, display, and distribute it solely in connection with providing our services. You may delete your content at any time. We do not claim any ownership rights over your content.

privacy.title: 5. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our collection and use of personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). By using our service, you acknowledge that you have read and understood our Privacy Policy.

conduct.title: 6. Acceptable Use
conduct.content: You agree not to: (a) use our service for any unlawful purpose; (b) harass, abuse, or harm other users; (c) post content that is defamatory, obscene, or infringes on others' rights; (d) attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems; (e) interfere with or disrupt the service; (f) use automated means to access the service without permission; (g) impersonate others or misrepresent your affiliation.

subscriptions.title: 7. Subscriptions and Payments
subscriptions.content: WishBubble offers both free and paid subscription plans. By subscribing to a paid plan, you agree to the following:

billing.title: Billing
billing.content: Paid subscriptions are billed in advance on a monthly or yearly basis. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each billing period unless you cancel before the renewal date.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: Subscription prices are displayed in Euros (EUR) and include applicable taxes. We reserve the right to change pricing with 30 days' notice. Price changes will take effect at your next renewal date.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.content: Payments are processed securely through Stripe. We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and Apple Pay. You are responsible for keeping your payment information current.

trial.title: Free Trial
trial.content: Plus subscriptions include a 14-day free trial. You will not be charged during the trial period. If you do not cancel before the trial ends, your subscription will automatically convert to a paid subscription.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time through your billing settings. Upon cancellation, you will retain access to Plus features until the end of your current billing period. No partial refunds are provided for unused portions of a billing period.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.content: Subscription fees are generally non-refundable. However, if you are an EU consumer, you have the right to withdraw from your purchase within 14 days of your initial subscription, provided you have not used Plus features during that period. To request a refund, please contact us through our contact form.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account at any time for violations of these Terms, with notice where possible. You may delete your account at any time through your account settings. Upon termination, your right to use the service ceases immediately, and your data will be deleted according to our data retention policy. If your account is terminated, any active subscription will be canceled and no refunds will be provided.

intellectual.title: 9. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: WishBubble and its original content (excluding user content), features, and functionality are owned by us and protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission.

disclaimer.title: 10. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Our service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or secure. We are not responsible for any purchases made based on wishlist information.

liability.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, WishBubble shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the service. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the past 12 months, if any.

indemnification.title: 12. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless WishBubble from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the service, violation of these Terms, or infringement of any third-party rights.

changes.title: 13. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of material changes by email or through the service. Continued use of our service after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the new Terms. If you do not agree to the changes, you should stop using the service.

governing.title: 14. Governing Law and Disputes
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Belgium. Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be resolved in the courts of Belgium. If you are an EU consumer, you also have the right to bring disputes before your local courts.

severability.title: 15. Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.

contact.title: 16. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please use our contact form.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how WishBubble uses cookies and similar technologies in compliance with the GDPR and ePrivacy Directive. By using our website, you consent to our use of essential cookies. Other cookies require your explicit consent.

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember information about your visit, making your next visit easier and the site more useful. Similar technologies include local storage and tracking pixels.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.content: We use cookies based on: (1) Legitimate interest for strictly necessary cookies required to provide the service; (2) Your explicit consent for analytics, preference, and marketing cookies. You can manage your consent at any time.

necessary.title: Essential Cookies (Always Active)
necessary.description: These cookies are strictly necessary for the website to function. They cannot be disabled.

items.session: Session cookie - Keeps you logged in during your visit
items.csrf: Security cookie - Protects against cross-site request forgery
items.consent: Consent cookie - Remembers your cookie preferences

necessary.retention: Session cookies expire when you close your browser. Authentication cookies expire after 30 days.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Consent Required)
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our website, allowing us to improve it.

items.none: We currently do not use analytics cookies. This may change in the future, and we will ask for your consent before enabling any analytics.

analytics.retention: Not applicable - no analytics cookies in use.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies (Consent Required)
preferences.description: These cookies remember your settings and preferences for a better experience.

items.locale: Language preference - Remembers your chosen language
items.theme: Theme preference - Remembers your dark/light mode choice

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies (Consent Required)
marketing.description: These cookies may be used to deliver personalized advertisements. We currently do not use marketing cookies, but reserve the right to add them with your consent.

control.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
control.content: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the 'Cookie Preferences' button below or in our footer. You can also control cookies through your browser settings:

browsers.chrome: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies
browsers.edge: Edge: Settings > Privacy, search, and services > Cookies

control.note: Note: Blocking essential cookies may prevent the website from functioning properly.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We use the following third-party services that may set cookies:
thirdParty.note: We do not currently use any third-party analytics or advertising cookies.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. The 'last updated' date at the top of this page indicates when it was last revised. Changes are effective immediately upon posting.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about our use of cookies, please use our contact form.

imageUpload.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please use JPEG, PNG, WebP, or GIF.

header.title: Choose the perfect plan for your gift-giving
header.subtitle: Start for free and upgrade when you need more bubbles, members, or want to use Secret Santa.

pricingPage.canceled: Checkout was canceled. Feel free to try again when you're ready!

trial.question: Can I try Plus for free?
trial.answer: Yes! Every Plus subscription starts with a 14-day free trial. You won't be charged until the trial ends, and you can cancel anytime.

limits.question: What happens when I hit a limit on the Basic plan?
limits.answer: You'll see a friendly prompt to upgrade. Your existing data is never deleted - you just won't be able to create more until you upgrade or free up space.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel your subscription at any time from your billing settings. You'll keep Plus access until the end of your billing period.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and Apple Pay through our secure payment provider, Stripe.

joinGroup.question: Do I need Plus to join a bubble?
joinGroup.answer: No! You can join unlimited bubbles for free. Plus is only needed if you want to create more bubbles or use features like Secret Santa as a bubble owner.

occasions.pageDescription: Find the perfect gifts for every occasion. Create wishlists and coordinate with family and friends.
occasions.badge: The smarter way to give gifts
occasions.heroDescription: No more awkward duplicate gifts. Create wishlists, coordinate secretly with family and friends, and make every celebration special.
occasions.chooseOccasionDescription: Select an occasion to discover gift ideas and create your wishlist
occasions.createBubble: Create a Bubble for This Occasion
occasions.howItWorksDescription: Create your perfect gift-giving experience in 3 simple steps

step1.title: Create Your Wishlist
step1.description: Add items you'd love to receive. Share your wishlist link so others know exactly what you want.

step2.title: Invite Family & Friends
step2.description: Create a bubble and invite everyone. Each person can share their wishlist in one place.

step3.title: Claim Gifts Secretly
step3.description: See what others want and claim gifts without them knowing. No more awkward duplicates!

occasions.ctaDescription: Join thousands of families who've eliminated gift-giving stress. Start your free wishlist today.
occasions.whyWishBubbleDescription: The easiest way to coordinate gifts and avoid the awkward "oops, we got the same thing" moment.

shareWishlists.description: Everyone adds their wishes in one place. No more guessing what people want.

inviteEveryone.description: Family, friends, or coworkers - bring everyone together in your bubble.

secretClaims.title: Secret Claims
secretClaims.description: Claim gifts without the recipient knowing. Others see it's taken - they don't.

secretSanta.title: Secret Santa
secretSanta.description: Built-in name drawing with smart rules. Set budgets, exclude couples, done!
